text: Nandao tamen zai dengdai zhe bu jingdian suo zai de [yuyan] zuizhong de jieguo ma? Dang zuizhong de jieguo lailin zhi ri, ciqian hushi jingdian zhe jiang shuo:“Women de zhu de shizhemen que yi dai gei women zhenli.[Xianzai] women you qiuqing zhe ti women qiuqing ma? Huozhe women hui bei song hui [chenshi] zuo women yiqian meiyou zuoguo de shangong ma?” Tamen que yi shi ziji shou sun, tamen suo niezao de paoqi tamen xiaoshile.
